tool.name: qiime feature-table presence-absence

param.label: --i-table: ARTIFACT FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency] The feature table to be converted into presence/absence abundances. [required]
param.name: itable

tool.help:
Convert to presence/absence ###########################
Convert frequencies to binary values indicating presence or absence of a feature in a sample.
Parameters ---------- table : FeatureTable[Frequency | RelativeFrequency] The feature table to be converted into presence/absence abundances.
Returns ------- presence_absence_table : FeatureTable[PresenceAbsence] The resulting presence/absence feature table.
